jointVenture.title: Join the Joint Venture
jointVenture.description: Be part of Chile's most ambitious industrial and maritime project. We're seeking strategic partners to bring Cabo Negro Terminal to Ready-to-Build stage and capitalize on the massive hydrogen economy opportunity.
jointVenture.investmentDescription: USD 2-5M initial capital for engineering and studies
jointVenture.partnershipDescription: Join J&P, PPG, and Compas Marine in this venture
jointVenture.impactDescription: Gateway to Antarctica and alternative to Panama Canal
